parameter.name: KikaiDB-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: Please provide the Offer Service database connection string.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=10.74.152.111; Initial Catalog=OfferDB;Integrated Security=False;User ID=offerDBUser;Password=offeruser;Connect Timeout=15;Encrypt=False;TrustServerCertificate=True

parameter.description: Please provide the offer link base URL
